mqtt.eli5: Imagine walkie-talkies for your smart home devices. They talk through a central base station.
mqtt.boss: MQTT is a lightweight messaging protocol used in IoT to efficiently send small updates from devices.
mqtt.sysadmin: MQTT (Message Queuing Telemetry Transport) is a pub/sub protocol ideal for constrained, low-bandwidth IoT networks.

dns.eli5: DNS is like the phonebook of the internet — it helps your computer find websites.
dns.boss: DNS translates human-friendly domain names into IP addresses.
dns.sysadmin: DNS (Domain Name System) resolves domain names to IPs using recursive queries and record types like A, AAAA, MX, etc.
